verses.verse: A Psalm for SHlomo <WH8010>. Give <WH5414> <WH8798> the king <WH4428> thy judgments <WH4941>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, and thy righteousness <WH6666> unto the king's <WH4428> son <WH1121>.
He shall judge <WH1777> <WH8799> thy people <WH5971> with righteousness <WH6664>, and thy poor <WH6041> with judgment <WH4941>.
The mountains <WH2022> shall bring <WH5375> <WH8799> peace <WH7965> to the people <WH5971>, and the little hills <WH1389>, by righteousness <WH6666>.

He shall judge <WH8199> <WH8799> the poor <WH6041> of the people <WH5971>, he shall save <WH3467> <WH8686> the children <WH1121> of the needy <WH34>, and shall break in pieces <WH1792> <WH8762> the oppressor <WH6231> <WH8802>.
They shall fear <WH3372> <WH8799> thee as long as <WH5973> the sun <WH8121> and moon <WH3394> endure <WH6440>, throughout all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
He shall come down <WH3381> <WH8799> like rain <WH4306> upon the mown <WH1488> grass: as showers <WH7241> that water <WH2222> the earth <WH776>.
In his days <WH3117> shall the righteous <WH6662> flourish <WH6524> <WH8799>; and abundance <WH7230> of peace <WH7965> so long as the moon <WH3394> endureth.
He shall have dominion <WH7287> <WH8799> also from sea <WH3220> to sea <WH3220>, and from the river <WH5104> unto the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>.
They that dwell in the wilderness <WH6728> shall bow <WH3766> <WH8799> before <WH6440> him; and his enemies <WH341> <WH8802> shall lick <WH3897> <WH8762> the dust <WH6083>.

The kings <WH4428> of Tarshish <WH8659> and of the isles <WH339> shall bring <WH7725> <WH8686> presents <WH4503>: the kings <WH4428> of SH'va <WH7614> and Seba <WH5434> shall offer <WH7126> <WH8686> gifts <WH814>.
Yea, all kings <WH4428> shall fall down <WH7812> <WH8691> before him: all nations <WH1471> shall serve <WH5647> <WH8799> him.
For he shall deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> the needy <WH34> when he crieth <WH7768> <WH8764>; the poor <WH6041> also, and him that hath no helper <WH5826> <WH8802>.
He shall spare <WH2347> <WH8799> the poor <WH1800> and needy <WH34>, and shall save <WH3467> <WH8686> the souls <WH5315> of the needy <WH34>.
He shall redeem <WH1350> <WH8799> their soul <WH5315> from deceit <WH8496> and violence <WH2555>: and precious <WH3365> <WH8799> shall their blood <WH1818> be in his sight <WH5869>.

And he shall live <WH2421> <WH8799>, and to him shall be given <WH5414> <WH8799> of the gold <WH2091> of SH'va <WH7614>: prayer also shall be made <WH6419> <WH8691> for him continually <WH8548>; and daily <WH3117> shall he be praised <WH1288> <WH8762>.

There shall be an handful <WH6451> of corn <WH1250> in the earth <WH776> upon the top <WH7218> of the mountains <WH2022>; the fruit <WH6529> thereof shall shake <WH7493> <WH8799> like Lebanon <WH3844>: and they of the city <WH5892> shall flourish <WH6692> <WH8686> like grass <WH6212> of the earth <WH776>.

His name <WH8034> shall endure for ever <WH5769>: his name <WH8034> shall be continued <WH5125> <WH8735> <WH8675> <WH5125> <WH8686> as long as <WH6440> the sun <WH8121>: and men shall be blessed <WH1288> <WH8691> in him: all nations <WH1471> shall call him blessed <WH833> <WH8762>.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, who only doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> wondrous things <WH6381> <WH8737>.

And blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be his glorious <WH3519> name <WH8034> for ever <WH5769>: and let the whole earth <WH776> be filled <WH4390> <WH8735> with his glory <WH3519>; Amen <WH543>, and Amen <WH543>.
The prayers <WH8605> of David <WH1732> the son <WH1121> of Yishai <WH3448> are ended <WH3615> <WH8795>.
